internal.content: --- title: "Metric Anomaly Training" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 62 --- ## üöÄ TASK: Define and run Metric Anomaly Training üåè Documentation for the Task: Setting up training for metric anomaly detection In this section you will set up and run training for this AI algorithm to `detect anomalous behaviour in your metrics` and notify you by generating an alert when they occur. ## Define Metric Anomalies Training 1. In the `CP4WAIOPS` "Hamburger" Menu select `Operate`/`AI Model Management` 1. Under `Metric anomaly detection`, click on `Set up training` (Disregard the message `You don't have any data yet`. The metrics data has been preloaded in this Lab) 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Done` ## Run Metric Anomalies Training 1. Click on the `Metric anomaly detection` card 1. Click on `Train Models` 1. Status should say `In progress` 1. And eventually say `Deployed`

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: "Metric Anomaly Training" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 62 --- ## üöÄ TASK: Define and run Metric Anomaly Training üåè Documentation for the Task: Setting up training for metric anomaly detection In this section you will set up and run training for this AI algorithm to `detect anomalous behaviour in your metrics` and notify you by generating an alert when they occur. ## Define Metric Anomalies Training 1. In the `CP4WAIOPS` "Hamburger" Menu select `Operate`/`AI Model Management` 1. Under `Metric anomaly detection`, click on `Set up training` (Disregard the message `You don't have any data yet`. The metrics data has been preloaded in this Lab) 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Done` ## Run Metric Anomalies Training 1. Click on the `Metric anomaly detection` card 1. Click on `Train Models` 1. Status should say `In progress` 1. And eventually say `Deployed`
